name: Truckin' Tomatoes
description:
You are a truck driver named Segwon who forgot to pickup his load of tomatoes. Luckily there are crates of tomatoes raining from the sky. 

Ram your truck into the crates and catch the falling tomatoes. 

Fill your truck up with 200 tomatoes as fast as you can!

Controls: Move your truck left and right with the arrow keys or the A and D keys.
